text:
#Update: #Pakistan announced Tuesday to export #chloroquine tablets believed to be an effective treatment against #COVID_19 to "friendly nations":

• Saudi Arabia & USA - 1M each
• UK - 5M
• Turkey & Italy - 500K each
• Kazakhstan - 700K
• Qatar - 300K
-
